job.title: Lead Software Developer Engineer in Test (SDET)
job.description: Technical leadership and hands-on role working as a member of cross-functional engineering teams developing automation code and leveraging multiple tools and techniques. Lead SDET provides technical leadership, strategic and tactical automation direction, and mentors QA and Engineering resources to ensure that software is of adequate quality. #LITECH ADP affirms that inequality is detrimental to our associates, our clients, and the communities we serve.
